event_description.name: event/description
event_description.description: Map the description of an event to EVENT crm:P3_has_note LITERAL.

event_note.name: event/note
event_note.description: Map the note of an event to EVENT crm:P3_has_note LITERAL.

event_chronotopes.name: event/chronotopes
event_chronotopes.description: For each chronotope, map the place/date of an event to triples which create a place node for the place and link it to the event via a triple using crm:P7_took_place_at for places; and to triples using crm:P4_has_time_span which in turn has a new timespan node has object.

event_assertion.name: event/assertion
event_assertion.description: Map the assertion of an event to EVENT itn:has_probability RANK^^xsd:float.

event_period.name: event/tag
event_period.description: Map the tag of an event to EVENT P9i_forms_part_of GROUP.

documentMappings.name: manuscript
documentMappings.description: Map a manuscript item to a node via the item's EID extracted from its MetadataPart.
